instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.description: This is a 3D scene created with Three.js.
text: You can interact with it by using the buttons in the controls section in the bottom left of the screen..
You can also click/touch and drag to rotate the scene.
Drag or upload an obj file to change the object rendered.
Drag or upload a square png file to change the material.

buttons.fileUpload: Drag a .obj file onto screen or click here to upload
